Signing up now!

Already have an account? Click here to login to your account.

Before you sign up, please make sure you've read our Terms of Service. Unlike other platforms, we make our ToS readable so you can be more informed, so please take a moment to read it before checking the box:



User Account Information

Let's set up your account!

1. Username - Create a username. Please do not put anything inappropriate or add personal information to your username.



2. Password - Enter a secure password to protect your account.



3. Email - Please enter your personal email OR your guardian's email. We will use this email to contact you about your reading progress and notify you about any updates, announcements, or recommendations.



4. Biography - Create a bio to be displayed next to your profile!






Personal Information

We will not share any personal information you enter here.

1. Name - Please enter your first name (or a made-up moniker of your choice). We will use this when emailing you.



2. Age - Please select your age range (or preferred age range). This will be used to recommend reading groups to you with similar-aged peers (within 3 years of your age).










3. Address - Please enter your address / suburb so we can map you to people near you. We will also use your address for book-swapping services and recommending. face-to-face events. Please enter in the form "City State Country" for consistency.





Book Information

Let's get to know your literature preferrences!

1. Genres - Select your favourite genres, styles, and themes!




























2. Length - What length do you prefer? You can select multiple.







3. Style - What narration styles do you prefer? You can select multiple.










4. Level - What is your reading level?
